home.question: If you have any question on JHipster:
home.like: If you like JHipster, don't forget to give us a star on
home.content-1: SoLocked is your personal digital safe. keep and manage the information about your accounts secured and encrypted

informations.title: Store and access your sensitive informations in one app.

slide1.title: Client side encryption
slide1.firstParagraph: Your data are encrypted before it ever leaves the browser. We don't store your password on our server. That means that we can't decrypt your data. Ever.
slide1.secondParagraph: We use AES 256 with the Web Crypto API : The standard encryption mechanism provided by the browser.
slide1.thirdParagraph: The decryption of your data only occurs on the browser side. So the only place where your data is in the clear is on your device.

slide2.title: Made in France
slide2.firstParagraph: Server based in France: No patriot act.
slide2.secondParagraph: Hosted by Clever Cloud : Awesome French Platform As A Service.
slide2.thirdParagraph: Using also OVH a French hosting platform.

slide3.title: Open source driven
slide3.firstParagraph: We use only open source library
slide3.secondParagraph: Based on JHipster : Amazing opensource generator with an awesome community.
slide3.thirdParagraph: Security report of the Jhipster sample app.
slide3.fourthParagraph: We will publish the security report for SoLocked very soon.

slide4.title: Password not transiting
slide4.firstParagraph: We use SRP (Secure remote password) : It means that our server don‚Äôt need to know the password of our users to authenticate them.
slide4.secondParagraph: Therefore the password never leaves your computer.

secondPart.title: What I can do ?
secondPart.first: Store credentials for all your websites.
secondPart.third: Check if your passwords have leaked.
secondPart.fourth: Store every informations you want through customs fields.
secondPart.fifth: Have a password manager? You can import your Lastpass, 1Password, Keepass, Dashlane data.
secondPart.sixth: Access all your informations in a clean and nice UI.

profile1.content: Passionate geek. Java, Typescript, Spring, JHipster, Angular. All the cool stuff ! üòç

profile2.content: For the last 6 years, I have focused my skills on the human-machine Interface systems for New Technologies and Innovation. On one hand Creative and on the other Technical, I have strong skills in Visual and User Experience for Apps and Digital products. I have a Master degrees in Human-Computer Interaction.

cookieMgt.title: Cookies settings
cookieMgt.subtitle: Solocked is designed for maximum privacy from scratch.
cookieMgt.paragraph1: We listen to the DO NOT TRACK signal of your browser. Your data are NEVER transmitted to a third party tool who is not hosted by ourselves. There are two kinds of cookies on the app : Matomo and Livezilla (see below for more explanation).
cookieMgt.paragraph2: In both case data (Matomo or Livezilla) are anonymized before the transmission.

matomo.content: The cookies for the tracker that help us to understand how you use Solocked. If you consent, it will help us a lot because we will have some real data about your habits in the app.

livezilla.content: The cookies for the support app for helping our users through Message or Live chat (Livezilla) If you consent you will have access to our support in case you need it.

cookiepopup.content: In order to help us to improve SoLocked and to have an optimal experience, you can accept the recommended settings.
